AppError.defaultErrorMessage: Tikufunitsitsa kuti musamavutike pogwiritsa ntchito Kolibri ndipo tikuyesetsa kuthana ndi vutoli
AppError.defaultErrorResolution: Pangani lifuleshi tsamba lino kapena pitani patsamba loyambirira
CreateLearnerAccountForm.header: Mulola kuti ophunzira alowe m'malo ophunzirirawa?
CreateLearnerAccountForm.noOptionLabel: Ayi. Oyang'anira akuyenera kutsekula akaunti kuti iwo alowe m'malo ophunzirirawa
DefaultLanguageForm.languageFormHeader: Sankhani chilankhulo chimene mukufuna kugwiritsa ntchito pa Kolibri
DeviceNameForm.deviceNameDescription: Chipatseni dzina chipangizochi lomwe inu komanso anthu ena mungalizindikire mosavuta.
ErrorPage.errorPageAdditionalGuidance: Ngati mwayesanso koma sizikutheka, zimitsani ndi kuyatsanso seva yanu kenako mupange lifuleshi tsamba lino.
ErrorPage.errorPageSubheader: Pangani tcheki ngati seva yanu ili yolumikiza kenako muyesenso.
FacilityNameTextbox.facilityNameFieldMax: Dzina la Bungwe silingakhale ndi mawu oposa 50
FacilityPermissionsForm.formalDescriptio: Ma sukulu komanso malo ena ophunirira ovomerezeka.
FacilityPermissionsForm.learningEnvironm: Kodi malo anu ndi wotani pa nkhani ya maphunziro?
FacilityPermissionsForm.nonFormalDescrip: Malo owerengera, malo osungira ana amasiye, malo a achinyamata, zipinda za makompyuta komanso malo ena aliwonse ophunzirira.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.fullDeviceDesc: Chipangizochi chidzayikidwa pa seva ya Kolibri yogwiritsidwa ntchito ndi oyang'anira, aphunzitsi ndiponso ophunzira.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.learnOnlyDevic: Chipangizochi chikhala ndi zinthu zomwe ophunzira angagwiritse ntchito, ndipo chilumikizana ndi chipangizo chonse.
FullOrLearnOnlyDeviceForm.whatKindOfDevi: Kodi ichi ndi chipangizo cha mtundu wanji?
GuestAccessForm.changeLater: Mukhonza kusintha izi nthawi ina pa malo osinthira a chipangizo chanu.
GuestAccessForm.description: Chisankho ichi chimathandiza kuti aliyense awone zinthu zophunzirira pa Kolibri popanda kutsekula akaunti
GuestAccessForm.header: Mulola kuti ogwiritsa ntchito awone Kolibri popanda akaunti?
GuestAccessForm.noOptionLabel: Ayi. Aliyense ayenera kukhala ndi akaunti kuti awone zinthu pa Kolibri.
HowAreYouUsingKolibri.groupLearningDescr: Chipangizochi chiyenera kulumikizana ndi zipangizo zina zokhala ndi Kolibri m'masukulu kapena m'malo ena okonza zophunzirira pa gulu.
ImportIndividualUserForm.deviceLimitatio: '{full_name} ({username})' ndi woyang'anira pa '{device}'. Chipangizochi chili ndi zinthu zokhudza ophunzira okha basi. Zinthu zokhudza aphunzitsi ndi oyang'anira palibepo.
'{full_name} ({username})’ ndi {non_admin_role} pa ‘{device}’. Chipangizochi chili ndi zinthu zokhudza ophunzira okha. Zinthu zokhudza aphunzitsi ndi oyang'anira palibepo.
ImportIndividualUserForm.doNotHaveUserCr: Kodi mulibe zokuyenerezani kuti mugwiritse ntchito?
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterAdminCrede: Lembani dzina lolowera ndi pasiwedi ya adimini wa malo kapena supa adimini wa '{facility}'
ImportIndividualUserForm.enterCredential: Ikani zokuyenerezani za akaunti yomwe mukufuna kulowetsa.
JoinOrNewLOD.importFromFacilityLabel: Lowetsani akaunti ya munthu m'modzi kapena angapo kuchokera ku malo ophunzirira omwe alipo kale
JoinOrNewLOD.joinFacilityLabel: Tsegulani akaunti yatsopano pa malo ophunzirira omwe alipo kale
JoinOrNewLOD.setUpFacilityDescription: Chipangizochi chidzakhala ndi zinthu za Kolibri zokhudza ophunzira, koma osati za aphunzitsi komanso za oyang'anira
JoinOrNewLOD.setUpFacilityTitle: Sankhani kasinthidwe ka malo ophunzirira pa chipangizo chongophunzirira basi
LoadingPage.loadingPageSubheader: Chonde dikiranibe. Kuika kungatenge maminitsi ambiri
OnboardingStepBase.importIndividualUsers: Lowetsani pawokhapawokha ma akaunti a ogwiritsa ntchito - {step} pa {steps}
PersonalDataConsentForm.description: Ngati mukuyika pulogalamu ya Kolibri yoti izigwiritsidwa ntchito ndi anthu ena, inuyo kapena munthu wina amene mwamusankha ndiye amene ali ndi udindo woteteza komanso kukonza zinthu za ma akaunti awo komanso uthenga okhudza iwo eni.
ReportErrorModal.emailDescription: Dziwitsani gulu lothandizira zokhudza vutoli ndipo tidzayesetsa kuti tithandize.
ReportErrorModal.forumPostingTips: Phatikizani mwachidule zimene munachita komanso pamene munapanga kiliki kuti vutolo liyambe.
ReportErrorModal.forumUseTips: Fufuzani pa folamu kuti mudziwe ngati enanso akumanapo ndi vuto limeneli. Ngati simunapeze yankho, positani m'munsimu zimene munakopera zokhudza vutolo kuti tifufuze njira yothetsera vutoli mu pulogalamu ya Kolibri yam'tsogolo.
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.header: Kodi mukufuna kuti ophunzira azitha kulowa pa akaunti pogwiritsa ntchito pasiwedi?
RequirePasswordForLearnersForm.noOptionL: Ayi. Ophunzira angathe kulowa mu akaunti yawo pogwiritsa ntchito dzina lolowera basi.
SelectFacility.noPermissionToJoinFacilit: Mulibe chilolezo kuti mukhale nawo pamalo ophunzirira awa
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.chooseAdminP: Sankhani woyang'anira kuchokera mu '{facility}' kapena tsekulani akaunti ya woyang'anira wamkulu yatsopano.
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.createSuperA: Tsekulani akaunti yatsopano ya supa adimini
SelectSuperAdminAccountForm.enterPasswor: Lowetsa mawu a chinsinsi a '{username}' m'malo ophunzirira a '{facility_name}'
SetUpLearningFacilityForm.importFacility: Lowetsani data kuchokera ku malo ophunzirira omwe alipo kale
SetUpLearningFacilityForm.setUpFacilityD: Malo ophunzirira akutanthauza malo amene mukukhazikitsa pulogalamu ya Kolibri, monga pasukulu, malo ena ophunzirira kapena panyumba.
SetUpLearningFacilityForm.setUpFacilityT: Khazikitsani malo ophunzirira a chipangizo chokwanirachi
UserCredentialsForm.learnerAccountCreati: Akaunti yatsopano ya malo ophunzirira a '{facility}'
UserCredentialsForm.signInInstead: Lowani ku akaunti yanu m'malo mwake?
